etymology.description: 凯(凱) (kǎi, "triumphant") + 里(里) (lǐ, "village; neighborhood") = the name of Kaili City, suggesting a place of triumph.
etymology.interpretation: The name 凯里(凱里) (Kǎilǐ) combines the notion of triumph with the concept of community or village. It suggests a place of success or victory, possibly reflecting aspirations or historical significance attributed to Kaili City.

examples.chinese: 我计划明天去凯里(我計劃明天去凱里)。
examples.english: I plan to go to Kaili tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 凯里风光迷人(凱里風光迷人)，吸引了众多游客(吸引了眾多遊客)。
examples.pinyin: Kǎilǐ fēngguāng mírén, xīyǐnle zhòngduō yóukè.
examples.english: The scenery of Kaili is charming, attracting many tourists.

examples.chinese: 在贵州的腹地有凯里(在貴州的腹地有凱里)。
examples.pinyin: Zài Guìzhōu de fùdì yǒu Kǎilǐ.
examples.english: Kaili is located in the heartland of Guizhou.
